on reading compounds: 休刊【キュウカン】suspension of publication
休暇【キュウカ】holiday, day off, furlough, absence (from work)
帰休【キキュウ】leave, furlough, temporary layoff
定休【テイキュウ】regular holiday, fixed day off, regular closing day
kun reading compounds: 休む【やすむ】to be absent, to take a day off, to rest, to have a break, to go to bed, to (lie down to) sleep, to turn in, to retire, to stop doing some ongoing activity for a time, to suspend business
休まる【やすまる】to be rested, to feel at ease, to repose, to be relieved
休める【やすめる】to rest, to suspend, to give relief
